 Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
 Require Import Coq.micromega.Psatz.
 Local Open Scope Z.
 Definition plus_one (x: Z): Z := x + 1.
 Definition shift_left1 (f: Z -> Z) (x: Z): Z :=   f (x + 1).
    Example shift_left1_plus_one: forall x,   shift_left1 plus_one x = x + 2.
